title: Inside Yohji Yamamoto's Fashion Philosophy | Inside Fashion
itunes:title: Inside Yohji Yamamoto's Fashion Philosophy | Inside Fashion
itunes:subtitle: In a rare interview, Yohji Yamamoto speaks to BoF's Imran Amed about the fashion philosophy that underpins his revolutionary career.To sign up to the Daily Digest newsletter click the link here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews For a limited time only we are off
description:
In a rare interview, Yohji Yamamoto speaks to BoF's Imran Amed about the fashion philosophy that underpins his revolutionary career.

To sign up to the Daily Digest newsletter click the link here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews 

For a limited time only we are offering our podcast listeners an exclusive 25% discount on an annual BoF Professional Member.
